name: WANDA Bergloff
text: The food is great. We had the lunch buffet!  The salad bar was wonderful and the pizza and pasta was hot and fresh!  And, oh my goodness the cinnamon glazed breadsticks were awesome!  They have the best unsweetened tea!  The atmosphere is ‚Ä¶More

text: This is an old school Pizza Hut so it was nice to visit it. Service was good but the pizza isn't really that great. You don't get what you pay for.

name: Latita Simpson
text: Great food and customer service.

name: Cindy Gray
text: Pizzas were horrible. We ordered 3 different kind and none of the 3 was worth eating. Excessively expensive for the quality. Will never order from pizza hut again

name: Kelly Reynolds
text: I love pizzavand Pizza Hut is my go to for pizza, my only complaint is they have not brought back my all time favorite that my husband and I had every Saturday night when we were dating back in 1993/1994 the Smokehouse Pizza!!! name: Amanda Phillips
text: Excellent experience. Pizza was hot, fresh, and delicious. Pizza was delivered within specified time frame given when I ordered online. Lady that delivered our pizza was hustling. I will definitely order again.

name: Sheila Ann Willis
text: We ate at the Pizza Hut at Henderson, TN.  They have a great buffet. Lots of different kinds to choose from. Salad bar was clean and fresh and the waitress was their best asset.  Very friendly, fast and sweet as can be!!

name: Jeff Heeney
text: Sometimes we have great service and other time it's terrible. And very slow. The pizza is usually always great tho. The buffet is a joke tho

name: Jeff Adams
text: Food and service was great!! Pricing issue with their online service, I called the store and they were very polite and had me call the corporate office about the problem. Within 5 minutes the pricing issue was corrected and food was ordered. Friendly staff and will definitely be back.

name: Tiffany Renee
text: Love using my pizza points! Cajun dry traditional wing me please.

name: Michelle Evans
text: I don't know what went wrong.  But we didn't get our pizza until we got up to leave had to get to go boxes and not many people there.  We have always had better service than this there.  I was very disappointed..

name: Adrienne Massengill
text: Love the contactless delivery!

name: Misty Farber
text: Kind of pricey (minus one star...was much cheaper where we moved from), but Pizza Hut is one of my two favorite places for pizza.  The workers are extremely friendly, and actually go out of their way to ensure that you have a good ‚Ä¶More

name: J. Stevens
text: Worse time ever. Slow to take order after you're told go have a seat. Brings pizza & garlic cheese bread & all is over cooked. Only ate 1 of the 3 garlic cheese bread. Had to go practically beg for someone to cut pizza again for us after ‚Ä¶More

name: Jon William
text: Great experience every time. Love the buffet & servers are very friendly

name: Kimberly Taylor
text: The food was nice and hot on the buffet.  We asked for a thin crust sausage and pepperoni to be added.  They put it out for us right away.  The store was clean and the staff were very friendly and attentive.  We'll definitely go back!

name: Kayla Moss
text: My pizza was delicious!

text:
I've been working here for 6 years.
I enjoy my regular customer as well as meeting new customers.
Buffet Monday thru Friday 11am to 1:30pm 5.99 plus tax does not include drink.
Sunday 11:30 to 1:30 6.99 plus tax does not include drink. Come see us ü§§ open 10am to 10pm

I've eaten here before and wasn't very impressed. Someone has made changes for the better. We will be back more often.

text: We've always had friendly service and we typically eat the buffet with our family. The buffet is a good deal with plenty of options.

text: Came in from california and stopped by. Food was great and fresh, staff treated us like we were from that small town. Would deffinatly go back again if I had the chance.

text: Typically pretty good. Have had issues from time to time but for the most part it is a good place to either eat in or carry out.

name: Kimmi Nichols
text: Sorry but everytime ive gone there I've tasted someone else's pizza. Maybe it was the toppings but the crust still tastes like cardboard. Never ordered my own even my friend ordered light sauce n the sauce was all over it looked like extra instead of light. Thumbs down sorry

text: Above Domino's, below Hunt Brothers. I don't live near a Pizza Hut, but I've stopped there a few times. No reason to make it below 5 stars, it was a normal experience every time I've been there. 5/5.

text: I went for dinner and ordered a pizza.  It seemed to take a while but I was by myself so that may have made the time pass slower.  I got the spinach Alfredo on a pretzel crust and it was just divine!!!  The service was friendly :-D I was very happy.
